title: Sion Global Voice
body:
Some of Sion's voiceover lines are playing globally (or at least for teammates). I can not recall if any skins were used, but I noticed it in more than one game.
Movement lines, in addition to some others. I beleive once I heard him mention a trap (enemy had Nidalee on team).

Not a huge thing, but just an oddity that I had noticed last night when playing.

replies.body:
Hiya DarkRitual! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are currently looking into it. ^-^
I had the same thing happen with the Announcer Draven skin. I was in mid lane and he was in bot, but whenever he put a trinket down I could hear his dialogue about wards. Is this known too?
Oooh, I haven't heard of this one. D: Lemme talk to the team to make sure it's on their radar!
Thanks! I wasn't sure if it was a bug or not since his skin was Announcer themed, so I didn't report it. :x
No worries! :) Looks like they are aware of it!
Aware of it is great. But ask them make it a feature for Primetime Draven instead of removing it!
Yeah considering the theme of the skin, I thought it WAS a feature!
Hey, just wanted to pop in and say the global ward dialogue bug happens for Azir too, Omega Teemo -- as well as Announcer Draven.
